name: Bullet Hell (Nasty Old Wizard)
description:
Controls: WASD - Move

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Fire bomb

When your skull is knocked off, run into an enemy to possess them and take on their appearance and weapon. 

Made for GM48: https://gm48.net/game/1257/bullet-hell

Code: https://twitter.com/casey_macneil
Art: https://twitter.com/DaltonLeavey
